# isSelectionOnly

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether only the currently selected contents should be printed.

## Declaration

```swift
var isSelectionOnly: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if only the currently selected contents should be printed, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Print Settings Convenience Methods

- **scalingFactor**: The current scaling factor.
title: isSelectionOnly
